remarks: The intersection of a universe with a class that acts like a universe is another universe.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jun-2013.)
statement:
ingru $p |- ( ( Tr A /\ A. x e. A ( ~P x e. A /\ A. y e. A { x , y } e. A /\ A. y ( y : x --> A -> U. ran y e. A ) ) ) -> ( U e. Univ -> ( U i^i A ) e. Univ ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
